events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 当组件需要更改模型时发出;也被 v-model 使用

checked-icon.description: The icon to be used when the toggle is on
checked-icon.description_zh: 切换开关打开时要使用的图标

unchecked-icon.description: The icon to be used when the toggle is off
unchecked-icon.description_zh: 关闭切换开关时使用的图标

indeterminate-icon.description: The icon to be used when the model is indeterminate
indeterminate-icon.description_zh: 模型不确定时使用的图标

icon-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
icon-color.desc: Override default icon color (for truthy state only); Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
icon-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

val.description: Works when model ('value') is Array. It tells the component which value should add/remove when ticked/unticked
val.description_zh: 当 model （'value'） 为 Array 时工作。它告诉组件在勾选/取消勾选时应该添加/删除哪个值

true-value.description: What model value should be considered as checked/ticked/on?
true-value.description_zh: 什么模型值应被视为选中/勾选/打开？

false-value.description: What model value should be considered as unchecked/unticked/off?
false-value.description_zh: 什么模型值应被视为未选中/未选中/关闭？

indeterminate-value.description: What model value should be considered as 'indeterminate'?
indeterminate-value.description_zh: 什么模型值应被视为“不确定”？

toggle-order.description: Determines toggle order of the two states ('t' stands for state of true, 'f' for state of false); If 'toggle-indeterminate' is true, then the order is: indet -> first state -> second state -> indet (and repeat), otherwise: indet -> first state -> second state -> first state -> second state -> ...
toggle-order.description_zh: 确定两种状态的切换顺序（'t' 代表 true 状态，'f' 代表 false 状态）;如果 'toggle-indeterminate' 为 true，则顺序为： indet -> first state -> second state -> indet （并重复），否则： indet -> 第一个状态 -> 第二个状态 -> 第一个状态 -> 第二个状态 -> ...

toggle-indeterminate.description: When user clicks/taps on the component, should we toggle through the indeterminate state too?
toggle-indeterminate.description_zh: 当用户单击/点击组件时，我们也应该在 indecertain 状态之间切换吗？

label.description: Label to display along the component (or use the default slot instead of this prop)
label.description_zh: Label 沿组件显示（或使用默认插槽而不是此 prop）

left-label.description: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the component
left-label.description_zh: 标签（如果指定了任何标签）应显示在组件的左侧

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Override default icon color (for truthy state only); Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

keep-color.description: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when the component is unticked/ off?
keep-color.description_zh: 当组件未勾选/关闭时，是否应该保留颜色（如果指定了任何颜色）？

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slot can be used as label, unless 'label' prop is specified; Suggestion: string
slots.description_zh: 默认插槽可以用作标签，除非指定了 'label' prop;建议：字符串
